meanings.definition: To break down or disintegrate into smaller parts through exposure to light.
meanings.sent1: The old photograph photodisintegrated over time, fading away into nothingness.
meanings.sent2: The delicate painting photodisintegrated when left in direct sunlight for too long.
meanings.sent3: The chocolate bar photodisintegrated under the scorching sun, leaving a sticky mess.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams of fame and fortune photodisintegrated like sandcastles under the harsh reality of life.
meanings.sent5: The ancient parchment photodisintegrated into dust at the slightest touch.

meanings.definition: The process of breaking down or disintegrating into smaller parts through exposure to light.
meanings.sent1: The photodisintegration of the painting was a tragic loss for the art world.
meanings.sent2: The slow photodisintegration of the plastic toy was evident from the fading colors.
meanings.sent3: The photodisintegration of the ice cream cone left a sticky trail on the pavement.
meanings.sent4: The photodisintegration of the ancient manuscript revealed hidden secrets within its pages.
meanings.sent5: The photodisintegration of the old building exposed its structural weaknesses.
